summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Temple 80G donation receipt generation feature. All critical backend APIs and frontend flows are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/donations creates donation with id, donation_number, amount, payment_status=Paid
Backend: GET /api/donations/{id}/receipt returns complete 80G receipt data with all required fields
Backend: Admin login works with admin/admin123 credentials
Frontend: /donations page loads correctly with e-Hundi form and preset amounts
Frontend: /donations/annaprasadam page loads correctly with AnnaPrasadam form
Frontend: Donation form submission works and shows success message
Frontend: Download 80G Receipt button appears after successful donation
Frontend: /donation-receipt/{id} page displays formal 80G receipt with all required elements
Frontend: Receipt contains receipt number, donor details, amount in words, temple details, PAN, section info
Frontend: Print button is functional on receipt page
Frontend: Staff login link is visible in navbar (top-right 'Staff' text)
Frontend: Admin login page loads and admin can login successfully
Frontend: Admin donations page shows donation statistics and 80G receipt buttons
Backend: All 31 API endpoints tested with 100% pass rate
Backend: 80G receipt validation passes with proper receipt number format (starts with 80G-)
Backend: Amount to words conversion works correctly (Indian number system)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (31/31 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (minor selector issues but all functionality works)
